title: Did the Trump 2020 campaign organize the flags and Paners in China?
subtitle: Bernie Sanders claimed that the President and his re-election campaign were responsible for increasing the production of Chinese manufactured goods "Trumbe 2020."
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: The Trump re-election campaign is responsible for an increase in the "Trap 2020" orders of flags and signs produced in Chinese factories, just before the imposition of U.S. tariffs.
